data.title: Committed to Academic Excellence
data.meta_description: Explore the top-rate private boarding and day school for boys. Experience a nurturing environment and exceptional educational programming.
data.text:
Welcome

Saint Stanislaus is a Catholic, all-boys boarding and

day school serving young men in grades 7 through 12.

Committed to Academic Excellence

Nurtured by Personal Attention

Rooted in Religious Values

Strengthened By Quality Athletics

Enriched By Social Interaction

Situated On a 42-Acre Sanctuary

Our Mission

The mission of Saint Stanislaus, a Catholic boarding and day school for young men, is to form each student to Gospel values by nurturing his spiritual, academic, and physical growth in a place of sanctuary structured to embody the charism of the Brothers of the Sacred Heart.

Unlock your son’s true potential at Saint Stanislaus, a premier Catholic boys’ boarding and day school offering an unparalleled educational journey for young men in grades 7 through 12.

BEGIN A TRANSFORMATIVE JOURNEY

Academics

Saint Stanislaus offers a rigorous college-preparatory curriculum with honors, Advanced Placement, and dual enrollment courses, as well as a nationally recognized Marine Science program that takes advantage of our beachfront location.

Embark on Your Voyage of Academic Discovery

Athletics

Saint Stanislaus offers a comprehensive athletic program with 13 interscholastic sports producing numerous state championship teams and even a Heisman Trophy winner among its alumni.

Discover Our Athletic Pursuits

Extracurricular Activities

Saint Stanislaus offers a diverse range of extracurricular activities for students, including arts and music programs, academic clubs, and recreational activities.

Discover Our Extracurricular Activities

Embark on Your Journey Today

Parents seeking an exceptional Catholic education that combines academic rigor, championship athletics, a wide array of extracurricular activities, and a nurturing faith-based environment are invited to apply today to experience the Saint Stanislaus difference.

An Unwavering Commitment to Academic Excellence

The Class of 2024 boasts one National Merit Scholarship Program Finalist and an impressive 12% of the class achieving an exceptional ACT Composite Average of 30 or higher.

Learn about our academic programs

Cultivating Champions Both On and Off the Field

Saint Stanislaus, ranked #2 in Mississippi by Stacker Media, has achieved 27 State Championship victories since 2009 and has produced 24 graduates currently thriving in collegiate athletics at the NCAA, NAIA, and NJCAA levels.

Experience the Rock-A-Chaws in action

Coastal Gem Shines Bright

Bay St. Louis, Mississippi, the picturesque hometown of Saint Stanislaus High School, earned prestigious recognition as one of the “50 Best Places to Live in the U.S.” in the April 2024 issue of Money Magazine.

Discover Bay St. Louis

Upcoming Events & Latest News

Back To School Night

6:00 pm

Saint Stanislaus invites parents and guardians to our annual Back to School Night. This event presents a wonderful opportunity for you to meet our dedicated faculty and learn about the exciting lesson plans designed for your son. We strongly encourage your participation, as it is a great chance to connect with one another and foster a supportive community. We look forward to seeing you there!

*

Game Day Experience

5:30 pm – 7:00 pm

5th and 6th grade boys are invited to join us for an exciting Game Day Experience! This event will feature fun games, an exhilarating performance by the Rock-A-Chaw Band and the Bay Ratz Marching Battery, and an inspiring pep talk from Varsity Head Coach Tate Thigpen. After the festivities, the boys will have the unique opportunity to welcome the Rock-A-Chaws onto the field. Don’t miss out on this fantastic chance for your sons to engage, have fun, and create lasting memories. Sign up today!
